donate now

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Today is Idaho Gives, which means today, your support of ACLU of Idaho goes further. By standing with us, you are helping the ACLU of Idaho continue our work defending and advancing the civil rights and liberties of all Idahoans, as laid out in the U.S. and Idaho Constitution and Bill of Rights. Will you join us for Idaho’s biggest day of online giving?

When you donate to the ACLU of Idaho, you are supporting our work to provide LGBTQ protections through efforts such as Add the Words. You are building our statewide outreach capacity to provide Know Your Rights trainings and presentations in even the most rural parts of our state. You are working to reform our broken criminal justice system, protecting our First Amendment and due process rights and safeguarding women’s rights to control their bodies.

We share a vision for a better community across Idaho. Help us take a stand against injustice by donating to the ACLU of Idaho.

Remember: donations are accepted and tallied online via the ACLU Idaho Gives donation page. Here, you can effortlessly donate, keep tabs on donor matches and track overall totals throughout the day.

Our goal for this year is to raise $26,000 to help strengthen ACLU programs statewide. Join us in building a better Idaho.

Thank you for supporting the ACLU of Idaho,

Kelsey Dillon
Director of Philanthropy, ACLU of Idaho
